alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 09 at 5:11PM EDT until September 10 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tide levels are expected to remain below minor flooding benchmarks this weekend. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Do not drive through flooded roadways.
